name: Sonic Unity

Sonic Unity is a 2-D Sonic fangame made using the Unity Engine. Its visual style is primarily inspired by that of Sonic 3/Sonic and Knuckles.

Controls

Use the arrow keys or WASD keys to move Sonic around, and use the space bar to jump.  While moving, press the down arrow or S key to make Sonic spin (curl into a ball), making him immune to most obstacles and enemies, with a few exceptions.

Repeatedly press space while pressing and holding down or S to make Sonic spin dash. Like in any other Sonic game, rings serve as not only collectibles, but also as a unique health system; if you take damage with at least 1 ring on hand, you lose all of your rings (as opposed to dying and losing a life right away, but there are a few exceptions, mainly drowning (yes, you can drown in Sonic games) and getting crushed) and they get launched in a circular pattern, allowing you to recollect those lost rings. You clear the level once you pass the signpost with Eggman's face on it.
